Dubai REST (Dubai Real Estate Self Transaction) is a complete digital platform to manage end real estate activities by owners, tenants and other service providers.

1.         Real Estate information: Using Dubai REST Mobile Application, users can access information about service providers like brokers, asset management companies, developers, DLD partners, developers, maintenance companies, valuators and so on.
